title: My New LoL Client isn't Working
body: So I decided to download the new client today. The process was smooth and before I knew it, I had a shiny new client. Only one problem though. When I try logging in, it doesn't work. The client says 'Unable to connect tp the login queue." I even downloaded the LoL patcher, yet nothing has changed. Can someone please help me?

replies.body:
That message typically means that something is blocking your network from being able to reach our servers and get you onto the client. You may just need to configure a few settings to tell you network to let League's connection attempts through. 

Check out our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some troubleshooting, but let me know if you need any more help ^_^!
